MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA9 postcode area of Prestwick, affecting Pleasantfield Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.16pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite and confirmed this has been caused by a fault on our underground cable network. After we have confirmation of access to the site and have an expected time for restoration of your supply we will update this message. We will require access to each property to check the incoming supply and appliances and we expect these visits to commence from 9am on Saturday 13th February. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.07pm on 12th February 2021
